md:
giải nghĩa từ "bs" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* bs (noun) : 
	+ Meaning: A Bachelor of Science degree.
	+ Vietnamese: Bằng Cử nhân Khoa học.
	+ Example sentence: "She earned her BS in Computer Science from Harvard University."
	+ Related words: BA (Bachelor of Arts), MS (Master of Science), PhD (Doctor of Philosophy).

* bs (verb) : 
	+ Meaning: To talk nonsense or speak foolishly.
	+ Vietnamese: Nói bậy, nói láo.
	+ Example sentence: "He's always bs-ing about his fake business deals."
	+ Related words: bluff, lie, deceive.

* bs (abbreviation) : 
	+ Meaning: Bullshit.
	+ Vietnamese: Đồ láo.
	+ Example sentence: "Don't give me any bs, I want the truth."
	+ Related words: nonsense, rubbish, crap.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "bs" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • bs (noun) :

    • Meaning: A Bachelor of Science degree.
    • Vietnamese: Bằng Cử nhân Khoa học.
    • Example sentence: "She earned her BS in Computer Science from Harvard University."
    • Related words: BA (Bachelor of Arts), MS (Master of Science), PhD (Doctor of Philosophy).

  • bs (verb) :

    • Meaning: To talk nonsense or speak foolishly.
    • Vietnamese: Nói bậy, nói láo.
    • Example sentence: "He's always bs-ing about his fake business deals."
    • Related words: bluff, lie, deceive.

  • bs (abbreviation) :

    • Meaning: Bullshit.
    • Vietnamese: Đồ láo.
    • Example sentence: "Don't give me any bs, I want the truth."
    • Related words: nonsense, rubbish, crap.
